CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Resolve hosts
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Resolve IP addresses to DNS hostnames (Note: makes DNS network queries on port 53)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Resolve ports
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Resolve known port numbers to service names (Note: Uses internal list; no network queries made)

EditTextPreference.android:title: Log file location
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Set path and filename of the log file (defaults to /sdcard/networklog.txt)

ListPreference.android:title: Load logfile history
ListPreference.android:summary: Select how much history to load, effective immediately and at app start (default: 1 hour)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Start log at boot
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Start logging when device boots up

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Start log at app-start
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Start logging when this app starts-up

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Stop log at app-exit
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Stop logging when this app exits

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Start foreground
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Prevent Android from killing service. Disabling this will remove the status bar notification

EditTextPreference.android:title: Max log entries
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Limit number of entries to conserve memory; older entries will be truncated

ListPreference.android:title: Base sort method
ListPreference.android:summary: Select how to sort the app entries that have no data yet (default: By name)

ListPreference.android:title: Sort method
ListPreference.android:summary: Select how to sort the app entries that have data (default: By bytes)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Status bar
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Display status bar notification when an app makes a network transmission

Preference.android:title: Choose apps
Preference.android:summary: Select which apps should have status bar notifications

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Toast pop-up
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Display toast pop-up notification when an app makes a network transmission

Preference.android:title: Choose apps
Preference.android:summary: Select which apps should have toast notifications

ListPreference.android:summary: Sets how often the data is summed. To see individual packets, set to 1 ms; for Kbps, set to 1 second; for Kb-per-hour set to 1 hour; etc.
Sets the time-range of data to show at once. If the range chosen is larger than the range of data, the viewsize will shrink to fit the data.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Logcat debug output
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Print verbose debugging output to logcat. Warning: may cause performance to degrade if enabled
